game.name: RAKKA: WAKE 01 - SOOT
game.shortDescription: Rakka is a sonically-driven, paper-cut style visual novel. Players progress through the story by exploring characters, dialogues, and clues that are crucial to understanding the answers that slowly unravel at the heart of this game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rakka is a sonically-driven, paper-cut style visual novel. Players progress through the story by exploring characters, dialogues, and clues that are crucial to understanding the answers that slowly unravel at the heart of this game.
